div.head: 字乳余疾
div.div: ailments in the aftermath of delivery

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: ailments in the aftermath of delivery

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with chan hou yu ji 產後余疾 . Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry sang jing shi 桑莖實： 主字乳余疾，輕身益氣 , “It controls ailments in the aftermath of delivery , relieves the body of its weight, and increases qi”.
